amendment.description: To authorize grants for local workforce investment boards for the provision of services to spouses of certain members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2558 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2558 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12787) To authorize grants for local workforce investment boards for the provision of services to spouses of certain members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2558 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2558 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Salazar.
